text.minefy.chat.loggedout.head: Looks like you still have to login with Spotify.\nRun
text.minefy.chat.loggedout.end: to authrorize Minefy to your Spotify account.
text.minefy.config.title: Minefy Config
text.minefy.config.hud.playback.name: Playback
text.minefy.config.hud.colors.name: Colors
text.minefy.config.hud.colors.descriptio: Change colors used by the HUD.
text.minefy.config.hud.colors.accent.des: Used for title and progress bar. By default Spotify green (0x1ED760FF).
text.minefy.config.hud.colors.text.name: Text Color
text.minefy.config.hud.colors.text.descr: Used for artists and timestamps. By default pure white (0xFFFFFFFF).
text.minefy.config.hud.colors.bg.name: Background Color
text.minefy.config.hud.colors.border.des: Used for border. By default Spotify green with lower alpha (0x1ED76088).
text.minefy.config.hud.colors.emptyBar.d: Used for empty bar. By default 0x242424FF.
text.minefy.config.hud.sizes.name: HUD Dimensions
text.minefy.config.hud.sizes.description: Change the dimensions for the main sections of the HUD.
text.minefy.config.hud.sizes.x.name: X
text.minefy.config.hud.sizes.x.descripti: X of top left corner of the HUD. By default 0.
text.minefy.config.hud.sizes.y.name: Y
text.minefy.config.hud.sizes.y.descripti: X of top left corner of the HUD. By default 0.
text.minefy.config.hud.sizes.width.name: Width
text.minefy.config.hud.sizes.width.descr: Width of the HUD. By default 178.
text.minefy.config.hud.sizes.height.name: Height
text.minefy.config.hud.sizes.height.desc: Height of the HUD. By default 60.
text.minefy.config.hud.sizes.columnX.des: X of the top left corner from which title, artists, ... start. By default 61.
text.minefy.config.hud.sizes.columnY.des: Y of the top left corner from which title, artists, ... start. By default 10.
Size for the border of the HUD. By default 2.
text.minefy.config.hud.bar.name: Progress Bar
text.minefy.config.hud.bar.description: Change style of the progress bar.
text.minefy.config.hud.bar.sizeX.name: Size X
text.minefy.config.hud.bar.sizeX.descrip: Size in X for the progress bar. By default 105.
text.minefy.config.hud.bar.sizeY.name: Size Y
text.minefy.config.hud.bar.sizeY.descrip: Size in Y for the progress bar. By default 3.
text.minefy.config.hud.bar.y.name: Offset Y
text.minefy.config.hud.bar.y.description: Offset in Y from `Content Y`. By default 42.
text.minefy.config.hud.bar.progressY.des: Offset in Y from `Offset Y`. By default 6.
text.minefy.config.hud.bar.textScale.des: Scale for the timestamps. By default 0,5.
text.minefy.config.hud.cover.name: Cover
text.minefy.config.hud.cover.description: Change style of the album cover.
text.minefy.config.hud.cover.x.name: X
text.minefy.config.hud.cover.x.descripti: X of the top left corner of the cover. By default 7.
text.minefy.config.hud.cover.y.name: Y
text.minefy.config.hud.cover.y.descripti: Y of the top left corner of the cover. By default 7.
text.minefy.config.hud.cover.size.name: Size
text.minefy.config.hud.cover.size.descri: Size of the cover. By default 46.
text.minefy.config.hud.text.name: Text
text.minefy.config.hud.text.description: Change style of title and artists texts.
text.minefy.config.hud.text.artistsOffse: Offset in Y from the title text. By default 6.
text.minefy.config.hud.text.artistsScale: Scale of the artists text. By default 0,75.
text.minefy.config.hud.text.titleMarquee: Maximum number of charachters title can occupy, before scrolling. By default 20.
Number of spaces to use when title has to scroll. By default 4.
Number of render ticks before title scrolls of one. By default 25.
text.minefy.config.hud.text.artistsMarqu: Maximum number of charachters artists can occupy, before scrolling. By default 20.
Number of spaces to use when artists has to scroll. By default 4.
Number of render ticks before artists scrolls of one. By default 25.
text.minefy.config.spotify.tokens.name: Tokens (DO NOT TOUCH)
text.minefy.config.spotify.tokens.descri: Touch only if you know what you're doing.
text.minefy.config.spotify.tokens.access: Needed to authenticate each request with Spotify.
text.minefy.config.spotify.tokens.refres: Needed to refresh access token when it expires.
text.minefy.config.spotify.client.name: OAuth Client (DO NOT TOUCH)
text.minefy.config.spotify.client.descri: Touch only if you know what you're doing.
text.minefy.config.spotify.client.id.des: The OAuth 2.0 Client Id from the Spotify for Developers Dashboard.
text.minefy.config.spotify.client.redire: The OAuth 2.0 Redirect URI configured in the Spotify for Developers Dashboard.
text.minefy.config.spotify.client.port.d: Port where to open the callback HttpServer.
text.minefy.config.spotify.debug.name: Debug
